mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (product_productId, member_userId, count) VALUES (#{product_productId}, #{member_userId}, #{count})
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET count = #{count} where cartId = #{cartId}
mapper.select: SELECT c.cartId, c.product_productId, c.member_userId, c.count, p.productName, p.price, pi.size, pi.color FROM cart c LEFT JOIN product p ON c.product_productId = p.productId LEFT JOIN productInfo pi ON c.product_productId = pi.product_productId
